name: Adventuring Gear
description: Adventurers always need a variety of gear, either while travelling or even when staying in a city. Plenty of vendors are eager to produce such items for the bountiful coin that an adventurer can provide.

equipment.name: Scroll
equipment.body: A Scroll is a piece of technology that can be used to connect to the international communication grid as well as store data, take pictures and videos, and use short-ranged communication that may accompany many security networks and constructs. Upgrades for a Scroll can be found in "Upgrades."
